mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply values(seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, CASE WHEN to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') = to_char(updatedate, 'yyyy/dd/mm') THEN to_char(updatedate, 'hh:mi:ss') ELSE to_char(updatedate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') END updatedate FROM tbl_reply where rno=#{rno}

SELECT rn, rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, CASE WHEN to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') = to_char(updatedate, 'yyyy/dd/mm') THEN to_char(updatedate, 'hh:mi:ss') ELSE to_char(updatedate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') END updatedate FROM (select row_number() over (order by rno desc) rn, reply.* from tbl_reply reply where bno=#{bno} ORDER BY rno DESC )
select count(*) from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno}
